original: @8a / /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @8a / /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened Buddha Śākyamuni.

original: tadya th'a / aom mu ni mu ni mah'a mu na ye sv'ah'a /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom mu ni mu ni mah'a mu na ye sv'ah'a /

original: lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na bskal pa bye ba brgya @8b phrag brgyad khri'i bar du sdig pa byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na bskal pa bye ba brgya @8b phrag brgyad khri'i bar du sdig pa byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recites it once, all the misdeeds committed for eight hundred thousand myriads of eons will be purified.

original: 'phags pa sh'akya thub pa'i snying po'i gzungs rdzogs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa sh'akya thub pa'i snying po'i gzungs rdzogs so //
translated: The Dhāraṇī of the Essence of the Noble Śākyamuni is complete.
